intro: Psychotria brieyi, commonly known as the Yucatan psychotria, is a species of flowering plant in the Rubiaceae family. It is native to the Yucatán Peninsula in Mexico and parts of Central America. The plant is characterized by its dark green, glossy leaves and small, clustered white flowers. It thrives in humid, shaded environments and is often found in tropical rainforests. Psychotria brieyi is noted for its ecological importance as a nectar source for various pollinators.
